requests.name: Television
requests.description:
A low-income elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) lives alone and her current TV set has since become faulty and cannot be switched on anymore. 

  

On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a TV set to help the client  stay occupied at home. 

    

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Caseworker Yu Xin at 8292 2205. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s place at Merpati Road. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

requests.name: Refrigerator
requests.description: Family's current fridge has broken down. Family consists of parents and 3 children. Both parents have chronic medical issues which do not allow them to work, thus family lacks income and unable to afford to purchase a new fridge. The family thus requests for a donation of a refrigerator.

requests.name: Portable air cooler
requests.description: Client is from a low-income family. recently husband's, who is sole breadwinner, employment situation has not been very stable. She is looking for a portable air cooler but is unable to afford one. It would be helpful if they are able to receive one! Thank you :)

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

requests.name: Refrigerator
requests.description: Client is currently unemployed. Because of the couple’s strained marital relationship, her husband is not contributing financially to the family. Due to a lack of familial, social support and financial resources, she is appealing for a donor to donate a fridge as the one she has is reported to be “not cold” to preserve the food.

requests.name: Air fryer
requests.description: Client is a single father with 7 children and is the sole breadwinner of the family. Client will greatly benefit from a (halal) air fryer so that cooking can be more efficient. Thank you.

requests.name: Installation of ceiling fan
requests.description:
Seeking for someone who is willing to install a ceiling fan out of goodwill (no installation charges).

Background: Client and her family with 3 young children is of low-income and recently moved into their rental flat.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Yew Tee
contact.name: Evelyn Chan

requests.name: Refrigerator with big freezer storage 511-512L
requests.description: Client and her husband are working for long hours. As such, they usually go for grocery shopping once a month. As their current refrigerator keeps breaking down, it causes their frozen item to spoil easily. A bigger refrigerator will allow them to focus on employment and not worry about the financial strain of buying a new refrigerator.

contact.name: S Maheswari

requests.name: Dryer
requests.description:
Elderly grandmother who is permanently unfit for work and has mobility issues is looking for a dryer, as she is unable to use the bamboo poles for drying of her clothes due to her health issues. She is living with one son who is still schooling in ITE. The family is dependent on government assistance to get by and are unable to afford on their own. 

Appreciate if donor can pay for delivery.

Thank you.

requests.name: Portable aircon
requests.description: Client is a young parent, married with 2 young children (M5,F1) and is currently pregnant with her 3rd child. Due to Covid-19, client's husband is having difficulty finding a job. Client suffers from depression and having a hard time caregiving with daughter who has heart problems. She hopes that having portable aircon will allow her children to sleep better.

requests.name: Washing machine
requests.description: A family with a teenage child needs a washing machine as their existing one has broken down. It is challenging for the family to save up for a new washing machine. The family would like support from the donor to cover transport. Thank you.

requests.name: CCTVs
requests.description: Needy household requesting for 4 CCTVs (E.g. XiaoMi Home security camera 360)to monitor the safety and movements of two 80 plus years old elderly staying in the flat. Please include delivery fees as they will not be able to pay for it. Thank you so much.

requests.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
requests.description: Single mother of 6 children requires vacuum cleaner to help ease her cleaning at home.

requests.name: Washing machine
requests.description:
Client is requesting for a washing machine due to her current mobility issues. She used to be able to cope with her daily household chores and washes her clothes by hand. After a long stay in the hospital, her physical condition has deteriorated affecting her ability to cope with her daily activities of livings. 
Please consider to cover the installation costs of the washing machine and water pipe as well. Thank you.

requests.name: CCTV
requests.description: Family consisting a single mother and her step-daughter living in a rental unit. Mother is currently unemployed due to a chronic health condition. Family experienced recent harassment and having a CCTV would help in monitoring the movements outside their home and increase their sense of safety.

requests.name: Portable AirCon

requests.name: PMD Mobility Scooter
requests.description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), Mdm S, is living alone in Ang Mo Kio Ave 4 and requires her daily usage of PMD to be mobile within the community. However, her PMD is wearing down and requires a repair or a replacement. As she has already utilised the SMF funding for her current PMD, she would not be eligible for a 2nd motorized device. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking either financial assistance in repairs or donation of a PMD.  
 
If you know of someone who can assist in either, please contact caseworker Anthony at 96546542 or anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We would appreciate if the donor can deliver the item to the client’s place at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg .

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

requests.name: motorize wheelchair
requests.description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

requests.name: 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter
requests.description: Elderly grandmother has multiple health issues and is unfit for work. She requires a 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter to get around and is hoping to get a secondhand one in good condition.

requests.name: 4 wheeled Mobility Scooter
requests.description:
Client is a 51yo man who has Parkinson's Disease and recently suffered a stroke. As a result of his medical illnesses, wife is currently the solebreadwinner for the family of 7 (3 children and 2 elderly parents). 
In a bid to alleviate some of wife's burden, client is currently looking for jobs and if successful, would require a 4-wheel mobility scooter to travel to work.

requests.name: Motorised Scooter
requests.description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

requests.name: electric wheelchair
requests.description:
client is requesting for an electric wheelchair due to mobility issues.
 

He recently developed a condition where all his bones are fusing together starting with his legs, and requires a wheelchair to get around. As he is losing mobility in his hands as well, an electric wheelchair would be more appropriate.

requests.name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
requests.description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

requests.name: Mobility Scooter
requests.description:
Client, 49F, works as a Grabfood deliverer. She is a divorcee and has two children living with her, aged 20M and 16F. She has been using a second-hand mobility scooter with faulty brakes, which has posed as a physical safety concern for her. She suffers from eroded knee joint cartilage on both knees which had been impacted from having to use her legs to control the speed when slowing down. She is also diagnosed with asthma/chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and is on regular inhalers. She gets short of breath when she walks long distances and hence, is heavily reliant on her mobility scooter. 

Client is looking for a replacement mobility scooter that has working brakes. She is open to having a second-hand one as well.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Merissa Boh

requests.name: Milk Powder (1.2kg)
requests.description: Our home need 20 packets of 1.2kg Milk powder (Everyday Brand) for our 522 elderly residents. Thank you.

contact.org: Ju Eng Home For Senior Citizens
contact.name: Lee Jun Hui

requests.name: Foldable Bicycle
requests.description: A female young adult living in a rental flat. She has poor family support and is receiving assistance for her finances and emotional needs. Her desire is to minimise expenses and would like to receive a foldable bicycle, so that she can cycle to work and save on transport costs. A donation of this bicycle would be highly appreciated. Thank you.

requests.name: Request for TPG compatible mobile phone for elderly please
requests.description:
Client is a 72 year old elderly who lives in rental housing. She is currently in between job and makes many calls for job search purposes. As a result, she has been topping up approximately $30-$40 a month to her prepaid card which is quite costly to her. She heard about TPG and has signed up for the $10 per month plan in hope to reduce her expenses. 

Her current phone is not TPG compatible. As such, she needs to use the TPG app to make calls, in which she has difficulty accessing which limits her call making.

Client hopes to be able to self-reliant and continue working as she is still in good general health. Hence, she hopes to have a TPG compatible phone which she is unable to afford due to her unemployment and limited savings. Thank you very much for your consideration and attention!

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Jesline Teo Kia Ling

requests.name: Sewing machine
requests.description: Family has 6 school-going children staying in a rental flat. Mother is looking for a sewing machine as hers has spoilt so that she can mend clothes at home to save cost. Husband is working full-time as an ambulance driver but is unable to afford a new/secondhand sewing machine.

requests.name: Tablet or Ipad x 2 pcs
requests.description: We are seeking for 2 pcs of Tablet or IPAD and wish to use these 2 items to track the safe entry purpose such as vaccination status and etc. of the visitors to our premises. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. WE have total about 80 to 90 in house stay of residents and staffs. The Helping Hand is a Volunteer Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service.

requests.description: Client (44/F) is a single mother and sole breadwinner of 3 children who has multiple health condition and a recent amputation in her toes from diabetic condition which affects her mobility in both legs that is painful and weakening in functioning and affecting her ability to walk. Client is requesting for donations for a mobility scooter (including ramps to install at main door) to allow her to independently travel for her various and regular medical appointments and to purchase her own meals as her children are still schooling and often have difficulties accompanying her or purchase her meals on her behalf. requests.name: CPAP Machine with Humidifier
requests.description:
On behalf of 1 one of our staff, who has been with us for more than 5 years. He is diagnosed with obstructive sleep apnea. 

He is required to sleep with the monitoring of a respironics dreamstation with humidifier every night. For the last few months, he has been renting the machine weekly, but the cost is quite high for him.
He cannot afford to purchase a set of the respoionics dreamstation with humidifier for regulating his breathing while sleeping.

Hence, we are requesting to support him a CPAP Machine with Humidifier.

We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. WE have total about 80 to 90 in house stay of residents and staffs. The Helping Hand is a Volunteer Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service.

requests.name: Adult Absorbent Protector
requests.description: Elderly man with bladder control issues requires urine absorbent pads while he recovers from a recent accident.

requests.name: QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit)
requests.description:
In line with the present COVID-19 situation, our organisation, The Helping Hand has added layer of ringfencing to help to identify cases and prevent further transmission, we have started conducting mandatory Covid-19 testing to all residents and staff since 15th July 2021.
The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. 
We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premise. We are using the QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit).

Here is the link for the requested item, thank you for your kindness.

requests.name: Wardrobe

Wardrobe for 10y/o child

Family has 1 children. Family requires assistance as they are in debt due to medical health. Wife is the sole incomer earner (low income) and caregiver to both child and husband.

requests.name: Single bed with bed frame
requests.description:
Single bed with bed-frame for 10y/o child

Family has 1 children. Family requires assistance as they are in debt due to medical health. Wife is the sole incomer earner (low income) and caregiver to both child and husband.

requests.name: Wardrobe For A Family Of 7
requests.description:
Our client has 5 children, and is the main caregiver for her children. 
Her husband is the only breadwinner of the family. 
She experiences high stress from caregiving and limited financial resources.
Hence, she is looking for a wardrobe that can fit in her children clothings. 
Thank you.
requests.specifications: Kindly give us 2-3 weeks for arranging of transportation

requests.name: A table of length 4'5
requests.description: A family of two, a son who is the sole breadwinner and the only caregiver to his dementia father needs a table for cooking. The dimension of the table is 4 feet 5 inches in length and 2 feet in width is suitable for their flat.

requests.name: Wardrobe
requests.description: Client and her family with 3 young children is of low-income and they have just moved into their rental flat. They are currently sourcing for a wardrobe.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Yew Tee
contact.name: Evelyn Chan

requests.name: Shelf with lock
requests.description: Client is from a low-income family and lives with her husband and 4 daughters. The family has some financial difficulties and caregiving stress. One of their daughters really loves arts, can be very messy and unkept. Hence the family is looking for a shelf/ table with a lock to be able to keep the things properly. However, due to financial constraints, the family is unable to afford it. Hence it would be helpful for the family to receive it. Thank you

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

requests.name: Sliding wardrobe
requests.description: Client is incarcerated. Son is in a community rehab centre and his Ex-wife is living with 14yo daughter. The ex-wife has a stroke and is a single-leg amputee and the 14yo daughter is the primary caregiver. They are looking for a sliding wardrobe which is more suitable for the ex-wife. However, they cannot afford it. Hence it would be helpful for them to receive one! Thank you :)

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Charmaine Lim
